name: Wisly and the Chickens!
description:
A simple, yet challenging, 2D platformer game based in a world of exploration to find a way to get rid of a big mess!



Wisly and the Chickens presents the comical story of a chicken coop revolt against a fateful group of weasels. The chickens tired of having their eggs stolen decide to put an end to this story and with Galinacio help, they start their deadly search behind the weasels. However, when the weasels learn of the hens' plan, they immediately try to escape, leaving only a single weasel, Wisly. However, what the chickens did not know is that Wisly never agreed with the evil actions of others of his species, feeding only on small fruits from the farm. But when faced with that enraged group of chickens, Wisly has no chance to explain all this, needing literally to RUN for his life!





  • Run for your life and complete the levels to advance! Take on challenging levels and find the best way to complete them and escape from the chickens. Oh sure! Wisly will always be running, since Galinácio does not come out of his tail!

  • Multiple environments, browse all biomes! Face different environments with different movement mechanics. Yes, Wisly can swim, dig and FLY!



  • Craft your devices! Collect the pieces needed for Elber to build the devices that will give you access to new environments!

  • Fuel, collect and management! Don't forget that the devices need fuel to work, collect them and management them correctly so you don't get in trouble.

  • Capture Galinacios! Collect the pieces of the cage to set up an ambush for Galinacio, perhaps it is the only way to solve it all!
